last_episode_to_air.name: The Big Beanbag Bash Day
last_episode_to_air.overview: It’s the Big Beanbag Bash Day and Love Monster is very excited to throw some beanbags and win some games. Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny does better than he does, and Love Monster feels jealous of the attention that she gets. He becomes so frustrated that he kicks a beanbag and it hurtles towards the scoreboard, knocking all the points to the ground, ripping the bunting and giving Delivery Duckling, Elder Chick, Elder Panda and the In-Chicks a fright.

name: Love Monster
overview: This animated series follows the colourful and funny adventures of lovable hairy hero Love Monster as he searches for the right thing to do in a world in which he is one of a kind.

episodes.name: Sharing With Others Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster comes back from holiday to find chocolates waiting for him, and because it's Sharing With Others Day he should share them with his friends - but they look very tempting. You see sometimes, it’s when you stop to think of others that you start to find out just how much they think of you.

episodes.name: Bouncy-Slidey Day
episodes.overview: It’s Bouncy Slidey Day, but Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny is frightened and stuck at the top of the big slide. Love Monster needs to be very brave and help her slide down. You see sometimes, when the big slide seems scary, it’s easier to face it with a friend.

episodes.name: Three-Legged Race Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster and Tiniest Fluffiest have trained together so they can win Three Legged Race Day, but disaster strikes when Elder Kitten puts them into different teams. You see, sometimes there’s an awesome idea in the middle of a tricky situation.

episodes.name: Show and Tell Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster can’t wait to show everyone in Fluffytown his favourite conch shell for Show and Tell Day, until he finds out that the day is meant to be unicorn themed! You see sometimes, when something is special to you, other people will find it special too.

episodes.name: Perfect Pineapple Party Day
episodes.overview: It’s Perfect Pineapple Party Day and Love Monster has dressed up in the perfect costume - but it means he can’t move properly and ends up knocking over the unicorn float. Can he save the day? You see sometimes, a prickly problem can turn into a perfectly sweet day.

episodes.name: Hot Hot Hot Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster causes a mess when he accidentally breaks the fro-yo.

episodes.name: Accidental Elder Day
episodes.overview: Mistakenly believing that he has become an elder, Love Monster gets a job.

episodes.name: Paint a Picture Day
episodes.overview: When Monster Teddy is chosen to pose for everyone's paintings, Love Monster misses him.

episodes.name: Yay for Rain Day
episodes.overview: Good weather ruins Love Monster's indoor day, as his friends want to play outside instead.

episodes.name: Special Surprise Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster must try not to open Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny's present before night-time.

episodes.name: Clear Out Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster tries to share an old disco ball with his friends.

episodes.name: Dancing Away Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster misses Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny when she has a dance competition out of town.

episodes.name: Picnic Night
episodes.overview: A mysterious giant bunny delays the nighttime picnic.

episodes.name: Carrot Day
episodes.overview: Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny wants Love Monster to try carrots, but he doesn't like them.

episodes.name: Give It Another Go Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster doesn't like the beach but tries to find something to enjoy about it.

episodes.name: Elder Kitten Day
episodes.overview: Everyone is organising a surprise party for Elder Kitten, and Love Monster’s job is to keep Elder Kitten busy while they get things ready.

episodes.name: Favourite Library Book Day
episodes.overview: It’s Favourite Library Book Day, but when Love Monster goes to show Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny and Elder Kitten his favourite book he borrowed from Book Cub, he can’t find it! What is he going to tell Book Cub? Elder Kitten's favourite book, Furlock Holmes, inspires Love Monster and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny to play detective and search all over Fluffytown for the missing book.

episodes.name: Happy to Help Day
episodes.overview: It's Happy to Help Day, so when Tinest Fluffiest Bunny asks Love Monster to help organise her dancercise outfits, he's happy to lend a hand. But when he also tries to help the In Chicks inflate their pool and the Council of Cuteness detangle their beards, he gets overwhelmed! Luckily, his friends know how to fix things in a way that makes everybody happy.

episodes.name: Plant a Seed Day
episodes.overview: It's Plant a Seed Day, so Love Monster and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny each choose some seeds from the Everything but Sprinkles shop. Although Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny's mirror-ball-dancing-flower seeds shoot upwards, Love Monster's hot chocolate flowers just won't grow, no matter what he does to help them...

episodes.name: Snowman Day
episodes.overview: It’s a snowy day in Fluffytown, so Love Monster and all his friends head to the mountain to have some fun. After seeing all of the interesting snow-people that his friends have made, Love Monster decides to build his own. Everyone admires his snowman, and when a gentle gust of wind makes it tilt to the side, Love Monster names him Tilty.  But when the sun comes out and starts to really beat down, Tilty starts to melt! Desperate to stop him from melting, Love Monster tries everything to stop it from happening before realising that he should enjoy Tilty while he’s still here.

episodes.name: Treasure Hunt Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster has organised a treasure hunt for Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny, Bad Idea Puppy and Delivery Duckling. He has made homemade cookies that are cut and iced to look like his friends. Love Monster gives them three clues to follow to find this delicious treasure. But as they head off on their search, Love Monster gets worried after hearing them speculate wildly about what the treasure is. Worried that his cookies won't be enough, he starts trying to make them bigger and bigger.

episodes.name: Choose One Thing Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny are excited about Bad Idea Puppy’s birthday party. First, however, they need to find him the perfect epic presents from the Everything But Sprinkles Store. They head to the Epic Ideas Department, which is full of things Bad Idea Puppy will love, but each time Love Monster thinks he has chosen the perfect gift he overthinks it.

episodes.name: Topsy Turvy Day
episodes.overview: Today is Topsy Turvy Day, a day when everyone has to do things the opposite way to how they'd normally do them. This confuses Love Monster, especially after he wakes up to hear Elder Kitten wishing everyone a good evening, but he eventually starts to enjoy it. As the day goes on, however, things start to get more and more difficult and soon become no fun at all.

episodes.name: Shooting Star Night
episodes.overview: Love Monster is hosting his first stargazing party, putting up star-themed decorations all over his garden and giving his guests special flower crowns. After turning off the lights, they all enjoy gazing at the shooting stars - until dozens of fireflies start show up, making everything too bright to see! With the fireflies following them everywhere they go, Love Monster comes up with a clever idea that makes everyone happy.

episodes.name: Switch What You Do Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster swaps roles with Delivery Duckling for Swap What You Do Day. She tells him her special delivery code by which he has to do the job in the form of a catchy rhyme, before heading off with a cardboard cut-out of Monster Teddy. But Love Monster starts having trouble remembering the code, and spends his day trying very hard not to make any mistakes.

episodes.name: Taking Turns Day
episodes.overview: When The In Chicks invent a new game, Love Monster, and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny have a great time playing it. But their turn soon ends, and the friends have to wait in a very long line for their next go. Along with Bad Idea Puppy, they try to think of ways to take their minds off the waiting.

episodes.name: Favourite Hat Day
episodes.overview: It’s Favourite Hat Day, so Love Monster proudly puts on his favourite knitted and decorated hat. But just before he heads out, he notices that it has started to unravel! Insisting he can still wear it, Love Monster pushes the loose yarn back up - but as the day goes on, the hat starts to unravel more and more.

episodes.name: Hot Chocolate Day
episodes.overview: Delivery Duckling arrives and tells Love Monster he has been chosen to be sipping host at a special Hot Chocolate Day ceremony.

episodes.name: Harvest Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster has been chosen as the prize-picker at the Harvest Day contest, but when he gets there it turns out there is only one prize and three teams.

episodes.name: Kite Day
episodes.overview: Elder Panda is teaching Love Monster to fly a kite. Love Monster loves to watch it swish around in the air. Elder Panda goes off to get some froyo, which is perfect on Kite Day. Before he goes, he tells Love Monster that soon it will be time for him to go on to his next kiting challenge.

episodes.name: Sleepover Night
episodes.overview: Love Monster is having his first ever sleepover night with Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny in a tent in his garden, and to make it extra special, he buys a snooze cloud pillow, which has double the bounce and triple the comfort.

episodes.name: Fluffytown Rocks Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster is practising a very complicated DJ spin, but he can’t get it right.

episodes.name: Red Envelope Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster is carefully putting the finishing touches to a set of cards that he is going to send out for Red Envelope Day.

episodes.name: Tidy Up Day
episodes.overview: It’s Tidy Up Day, so everyone in Fluffytown is tidying things. Love Monster helps Book Cub to clean up the forest, and as he does so, finds several items that would make great souvenirs. These include a bunny-shaped rock, a cloud-shaped leaf and a heart-shaped stone. But he doesn't notice that each time he take a souvenir, it disturbs a forest creature that was using it. Once he finally realises this, he and Book Cub work together to put all of the treasures back in their rightful places.

episodes.name: Ha Ha Ha Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster visits Dr Piggles on Ha Ha Ha Day, only to find that his friend has the hiccups and is unable to make his patients laugh. Dr Piggles asks Love Monster if he can fill in for him while he rests, assuring him that he'll be right there to help out. But when the hiccups get worse, he has to lock himself in the back room, and Love Monster must find ways to make all the patients laugh by himself.

episodes.name: Befriend a Bug Day
episodes.overview: It's Befriend a Bug Day, but Love Monster keeps accidentally annoying or scaring the bugs in his garden. When Elder Kitten reminds him that he is DJing at the Befriend a Bug party later, he starts practising his beatboxing. He notices some caterpillars on a nearby branch dancing to the music, but when he tries to approach them, they get frightened and curl up.

episodes.name: Frozen Fun Day
episodes.overview: It’s Frozen Fun Day, and Love Monster is having trouble learning to ice-skate. He asks Elder Kitten, who is much better at it, to teach him. Elder Kitten agrees to show him how and tells him that the trick is to get back up after falling. Despite falling over again and again, Love Monster gradually gets better - but how will he do in the big show?

episodes.name: Make Something Epic Day
episodes.overview: It’s Make Something Epic Day, and Love Monster knows exactly what he is going to make. In a fantasy, he imagines standing at the top of an epic fort in the forest while his friends come to play with him. Out of the fantasy, Love Monster gets to work on a building using rocks, twigs and wood from the forest. But when he has finished building, the fort that he has made isn’t epic at all. It’s just a pile of rocks, twigs and wood. He realises that this might be a bigger job than he thought.

episodes.name: Do Something New Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster is finding it hard to think of something new to do on Do Something New Day, so he heads to Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny’s house to see if she has any ideas.

episodes.name: Challenge Yourself Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster is excited to start a Challenge Yourself Day adventure with his friends. He’s planned a mountain hike with a special sunset surprise for them at the peak. At the base of the mountain, Love Monster hands out equipment to Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny, Bad Idea Puppy and Book Cub. But when he tries to talk through his plan and warm-up, his friends play with their equipment and have fun doing their own exercises. A little frustrated, Love Monster blows his whistle to get their attention and says it’s time to start climbing.

episodes.name: Super Sound Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster heads out to meet up with Book Cub, who has a special Super Sound Day surprise for him. Before he meets her, he hears a buzzing bee and has fun beatboxing to it.

episodes.name: Lost Things Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster arrives at the Lost Things Office, ready to help Elder Bunny try and reunite the citizens of Fluffytown with possessions they might have lost.

episodes.name: Frosty Frolics Day
episodes.overview: It’s Frosty Frolics Day, and Love Monster plans to spend it with Bad Idea Puppy and his cousin Good Idea Puppy, who has come to visit. Love Monster thinks that since Good Idea Puppy is the guest, she should choose which activity they do first. She decides that they should start with the ice slide. Love Monster and Good Idea Puppy go together and have a great time, but Bad Idea Puppy has to go on his own and struggles to slide down.

episodes.name: Day After Woo Hoo Day
episodes.overview: A half-asleep Love Monster exits his house and walks towards the green, passing snoozing citizens on the way. He notices that the whole of the green is covered with litter and snoring Fluffytowners. Love Monster remembers that yesterday was Woo Hoo Day and the whole of Fluffytown had a big party - which makes today the Day After Woo Hoo Day.

episodes.name: Invent Something New Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster and his teammate Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny are excited to be entering the Invent Something New Day contest at the recycling shed.

episodes.name: Mooncake Day
episodes.overview: It’s the morning of the Mooncake Day festival. Love Monster announces to everyone that he is going to make an enormous, record-breaking, strawberry moon cake for the finale, which will take place at his house later. The festival begins, and Love Monster borrows a recipe book from Book Cub on how to make moon cakes. Love Monster reads the list of ingredients; he’ll need eggs, butter, flour and strawberries. Book Cub reminds him that big moon cakes take a little longer to make, but they are worth the extra work.

episodes.name: Starring Role Day
episodes.overview: It’s Put on a Play Day, and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny and Bad Idea Puppy are both hoping that they are picked for the starring role in a play called The Mystery Package. Love Monster doesn’t know which role he would like. When Elder Kitten announces that this year he would like to play a tree, Love Monster is given the role of the director.

episodes.name: Pool Party Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster is finishing the preparations for his pool party when he notices a very small leak in his inflatable pool. As Love Monster inspects the leak, Bad Idea Puppy, Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny and Delivery Duckling arrive ready for the party. Love Monster thinks he could tape the leak up quickly but doesn’t want to miss out on the fun with his friends, so he leaves it.

episodes.name: Spectacular Sparkly Night
episodes.overview: Love Monster is playing a quiet game of checkers with Monster Teddy when a firework makes a loud bang outside and startles him. Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny and Bad Idea Puppy arrive and check if he is okay. Love Monster asks what the noise was, and his friends explain that it was a firework, ahead of the Spectacular Sparkly Night show that evening. Love Monster really wants to see the amazing fireworks with his friends, but he doesn’t like being scared by the loud noises.

episodes.name: In a Spin Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster has agreed to teach Bad Idea Puppy how to DJ for the In a Spin Day opening ceremony. He starts by trying to teach him the beginning of his In a Spin Day song. The song is composed by pressing a series of buttons in a particular order, which Love Monster slowly demonstrates. But when it’s Bad Idea Puppy’s turn, he forgets the order and hits other random buttons, causing the song to go super-fast or super-loud. Not how Love Monster wants it to be.

episodes.name: Dress Up Day
episodes.overview: It’s Dress Up Day in Fluffytown, and Love Monster is excited to show off his Music Monster superhero costume. It’s a superhero character that he has invented, and his superpower is his beatboxing, which makes villains run away.

episodes.name: Very Dark Night
episodes.overview: It’s the darkest night of the year, so Love Monster plans on getting cosy in bed. He turns the light off but jumps when he hears a hooting noise from outside. He looks out of the window and chuckles when he sees that it’s just Nighty-Night Owl on her bedtime walk. Love Monster looks at the dark room apprehensively and turns on his bedroom light, saying maybe he and Monster Teddy can sleep with the light on. He gets into bed but struggles to fall asleep with the bright light above him.

episodes.name: Super Fun Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster goes about his morning routine of making breakfast, but nothing goes right for him – he stubs his toe, spills his cereal, runs out of milk and his toaster malfunctions. On the radio, Elder Kitten announces that today is Super Fun Day, a day where Fluffytowners are encouraged to have their most-super-fun-day ever. Love Monster grumbles to himself that Super Fun Day is not super-fun so far.

episodes.name: Movie Night
episodes.overview: Love Monster and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny are at Love Monster’s house, excitedly preparing for Fluffytown’s Movie Night. Love Monster has made a huge bag of popcorn to share and is also bringing the new Hero Bunzino movie for everyone to watch. Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny and her cousin Eager Beaver have even dressed up as Hero Bunzino for the occasion! They head out, but when Love Monster tries to carry the huge bag of popcorn out, it gets stuck in his doorway. He gives it a big push, which causes some popcorn to spill out and cover Eager Beaver, who captures the whole thing on her new movie camera.

episodes.name: A Very Merry Unicorn Day
episodes.overview: When it doesn’t snow on Unicorn Day, Love Monster uses snow bubbles to cover Fluffytown with snow so Glitterhorn can deliver their presents, but he accidentally snows everyone in!

episodes.name: Jam Session Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster and Bad Idea Puppy are getting ready to jam on Jam Session Day, but before they can start, Bad Idea Puppy realises that he needs the bathroom. He rushes off and in his hurry he accidentally snaps the key in the door and locks himself in. Bad Idea Puppy realises that the sound bounces off everything in the bathroom, and it’s a great place to jam!

episodes.name: Camping Buddy Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster and Delivery Duckling arrive for a camping trip in the great outdoors. It’s Love Monster’s first ever camping trip, and Delivery Duckling is honoured to be his first ever camping buddy and show him the ropes. Everything starts to go wrong, however, and Love Monster thinks that maybe he just isn’t meant to be a camping expert like Delivery Duckling.

episodes.name: Splash About Day
episodes.overview: It’s Splash About Day, and everyone is having fun at the beach under the watchful eye of lifeguard Delivery Duckling and her assistant lifeguard Love Monster! It’s Love Monster’s job to help keep everyone safe, and he is taking his role very seriously – to the point of making sure the paddling Elder Mouse has a life jacket on. As Love Monster looks out across the water, he suddenly spots something moving around strangely. Love Monster worries that it might be dangerous, so he blows his whistle to get everyone out of the water. Is everything okay?

episodes.name: Happy Healthy Day
episodes.overview: It’s Happy Healthy Day, and all the Fluffytowners are doing fun things that make them feel happy and healthy. But unfortunately, this means that Dr Piggles has no-one to look after so he feels fed up. Love Monster wants to make Dr Piggles feel better, so he decides to feign an illness so he can be the perfect patient. Dr Piggles tells Love Monster that he won’t stop until he finds out what is wrong with him, and this makes Love Monster worry. What if Dr Piggles finds out that he is fibbing?

episodes.name: Super Rainbow Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster excitedly watches the rainfall out of his window as Elder Kitten announces on the radio that it’s Super Rainbow Day at last. The rain stops, the clouds part and a super rainbow appears in the sky, sending sparkling rays into Love Monster’s house. Ever since he was a baby, it’s been Love Monster’s biggest dream to find the magic sparkle dust at the end of the super rainbow. But he’d better get a wriggle on because super rainbows don’t last for ever.

episodes.name: Siesta Fiesta Day
episodes.overview: Everyone in Fluffytown is gathered for a communal nap ahead of the big Siesta Fiesta Day celebration – because the better the nap, the better the party afterwards. Elder Chick demonstrates the Fluffytown nap timer and explains when she presses the button it’s time to snooze, and when the hand reaches the balloon, it’s time for the Siesta Fiesta.

episodes.name: Makeover Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster, Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny and Bad Idea Puppy arrive at Elder Kitten’s house with a cart full of decorating things. It’s Makeover Day, and they want to make over Elder Kitten’s living room while he gets a relaxing makeover himself at the Fluffytown spa.

episodes.name: Woodworking Day
episodes.overview: It’s Woodworking Day, and Love Monster has a very special project planned. He uses his tools to craft a toy aeroplane from a wooden log. He can’t wait to take it out for its first flight, but when he steps outside he is greeted by Bad Idea Puppy and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny who take it for a spin.

episodes.name: Fluffytown Swap Day
episodes.overview: It’s Fluffytown Swap Day, and Love Monster is in his attic looking for things that he doesn’t need so he can swap them with people who do need them. But, instead of leaving them in the box for the swap, Love Monster has fun with them and changes his mind taking them out again. He looks in his swap box to see his progress and is alarmed to see that it is still empty.

episodes.name: Take a Treat Day
episodes.overview: It’s Take-a-Treat Day, and Love Monster is wearing a gumball machine costume and is on his way to meet Bad Idea Puppy. They’re going to go treat-taking together, and Bad Idea Puppy is determined to set a new Fluffytown speed-treat-taking record. He’s wearing a rocket costume with various buttons and panels on it.

episodes.name: Moving Day
episodes.overview: Bad Idea Puppy listens in on a Council of Cuteness meeting and mishears that Take My Time Tortoise is moving. The false news spreads as he and Love Monster plan a leaving party.

episodes.name: Party All Day Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster wants to make sure he does all the activities on Party All Day Day, but he starts to feel tired before his favourite bit - the conga!

episodes.name: Babysitting Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster looks after a baby koala for the day and experiences all the ups and downs of parenthood as he tries to keep her happy.

episodes.name: Sparkle and Shine Day
episodes.overview: It’s Sparkle and Shine Day in Fluffytown, and Love Monster happily rides his scooter wearing a sparkly cape and sunglasses. He does a cool trick and continues on to the Everything But Sprinkles store, where Elder Mouse is giving a sales spiel about a shiny new scooter to a group of Fluffytowners. Love Monster compares it with his own old scooter and all of its scuffs. Elder Mouse wheels out the new scooter and rings its shiny bell. This sells it for Love Monster, and he asks if he can trade his old scooter for the new one. Elder Mouse agrees and they swap. Now, Love Monster can celebrate Sparkle and Shine Day in style!

episodes.name: Breakfast for Dinner Day
episodes.overview: It’s Breakfast for Dinner Day, and Love Monster is throwing an exquisite party. He gets to work on the decorations for his table, but as the clock ticks over, Love Monster realises that he has spent too long on them and didn’t leave time to cook his extra special breakfast. As Love Monster panics, there’s a knock at his door and his guests arrive.

episodes.name: Extreme Snowy Sports Day
episodes.overview: It’s Extreme Snowy Sports Day and Love Monster is excited to show Monster Teddy the extreme slopes on Mount Fluffaroo. At that moment, Delivery Duckling skis down and covers Love Monster in snow. She apologises saying she was having ‘snow’ much fun that she didn’t see him. Love Monster continues to the slopes, but at that moment, Elder Kitten makes an announcement reminding everyone they have to be taller than the picture of the safety seal if they want to play extreme sports.

episodes.name: Be a Brave Bunny Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster is dancing down the street towards Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny’s house carrying a balloon. He has made up a dance for her birthday – the Bunny Bop! He is really excited to perform his special dance for his best friend, but doing it in front of anyone else makes his feet go wobbly.

episodes.name: What's Going on Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster wakes up and goes to his calendar to see what Fluffytown will be celebrating that day. But when he gets there, he is confused to find that there is no special day sticker on his calendar today. Love Monster looks worried; how can he prepare for the day’s activities if he doesn’t know what day it is? Love Monster decides that he will just have to prepare for everything and loads up his cart with an array of random items.

episodes.name: Make a Plan Day
episodes.overview: It’s Make a Plan Day and Love Monster and Elder Panda are in the Everything but Sprinkles Store getting supplies for the very busy day they have planned together. They’ve planned crafting, bonsai snipping, hot chocolate sipping, kite flying, DJing and pipa playing. Elder Panda realises that he has forgotten to get the stickers for their crafting so tells Love Monster to wait for him with the basket while he goes to get them. He heads off, but while Love Monster waits, he hears an announcement over the loudspeaker from the store owner Elder Mouse.

episodes.name: Magic Show Day
episodes.overview: In a big top in Fluffytown, everyone is excitedly getting ready for Magic Show Day when they perform magic for the Elders. The most excited one of all is Love Monster, who has been practising his magic tricks for weeks. Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny appears and says she has practised her trick 172 times to get it just right and also says it was so hard to pick just one to perform for the Elders. This confuses Love Monster, who didn’t know he had to pick just one trick.

episodes.name: Treat Your Friends Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster can’t wait to pamper Eager Beaver and Book Cub at the Fluffytown spa for Treat Your Friends Day. Elder Sheep welcomes them to the spa and guarantees they will be relaxed before they leave. But when they take their time to relax, Love Monster tries to rush things causing everyone to be stressed instead.

episodes.name: Lost Parcel Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster helps Delivery Duckling try to deliver a lost parcel so she can keep her 100 per cent delivery record, but all the clues they find send them down dead ends.

episodes.name: Elders Away Day
episodes.overview: Elder Kitten has a big announcement. He tells everyone that today is Elders Away Day, when the Council of Cuteness goes on holiday, and says they need a volunteer to lead Fluffytown. Eager Beaver puts her hand up and says that if she is picked, they will break the record for the most fun things done in one day. The Elders are impressed and Elder Kitten announces that Eager Beaver will be the leader for the day. But Eager Beaver becomes so determined to break the fun record that she bosses her friends around

episodes.name: The Big Beanbag Bash Day
episodes.overview: It’s the Big Beanbag Bash Day and Love Monster is very excited to throw some beanbags and win some games. Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny does better than he does, and Love Monster feels jealous of the attention that she gets. He becomes so frustrated that he kicks a beanbag and it hurtles towards the scoreboard, knocking all the points to the ground, ripping the bunting and giving Delivery Duckling, Elder Chick, Elder Panda and the In-Chicks a fright.

episodes.name: Road Trip Day
episodes.overview: Love Monster is on a road trip with Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny in her carrot car. Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny is finally going to Carrot Rock Canyon just like her great-great-aunt did. However, they find the route a lot harder than they thought. When they finally end up in Carrot Rock Canyon, Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny thanks Love Monster for taking the hard way, and they take some photos of themselves at the amazing canyon.
